SELECT rsi.id, rsi.num, rsi.content, rsi.price, rsi.enterprise_id, rsi.put_address, rsi.put_longitude, rsi.put_latitude, rsi.out_address, rsi.out_longitude, rsi.out_latitude, rsi.logistics, rsi.status, rsi.create_date, ei.name FROM request_supply_info rsi LEFT JOIN enterprise_info ei ON (ei.id = rsi.enterprise_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{requestSupplyInfo.name},'%')
AND rsi.num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{requestSupplyInfo.num},'%')
AND rsi.status = #{requestSupplyInfo.status}
ORDER BY rsi.create_date DESC
